__e: Mr. Queen, if you're entertaining guests upstairs, should I have some drinks sent up?

And... erm... I'll go... I'll go and see about the drink.
I know. I wish we could bring her something, but there's so many rules.
It allows me to bring something hot as before?
You remember I said I might be able to bring you something special?
It's going to be hard and complicated, now that you and Jo are together, and... She's in Jenna's life now and I can't take that from her.
I mean, you're really so scared about one guy not liking you that you're going to take this away from her? Huh?
And maybe that baby wasn't David's, or maybe it was and he didn't want it, but you cannot go in there and take away her chance for becoming a mother.
I promised to take her a dress pattern that she admired.
I was planning on dropping in on her later. I'd be happy to drop the laptop off if you'd like.
Now I'm getting her coffee every morning and I'm doing her work for her.
We could bring her a change of clothes and stuff to make her feel more comfortable.
Could you at least take her a message for me or maybe some money?

If you're ever- This is how selfish people are.
My wife, too, and I need to get them someplace else.
